articles.author: Penelope Green
articles.title: Our Lives, Under Construction
articles.description: Three hundred miles of protection envelops New York City. What can we make of it?
articles.content: Nearly a decade ago, the city held a competition to completely rethink the much-maligned structures. The winning design, from Young-Hwan Choi, then an architecture student at the University of Pennsylvania, in collaboration with Agencie, a Manhattan architect… [+1886 chars]

articles.author: Elian Peltier
articles.title: ‘Ethical Veganism’ Is a Philosophical Belief, British Court Rules
articles.description: A judge said that ethical vegans are entitled to similar protection in the workplace as those holding religious beliefs.
articles.content: Other experts went further. Following this decision, employers need to be alert to the risk of discriminating against people who hold beliefs that traditionally might not have been considered to be protected under employment law, said Hayley Trovato, a legal … [+1239 chars]

articles.author: Isabel Kershner
articles.title: Israel Lauds Suleimani Assassination, Though With Caution
articles.description: Israeli intelligence had long tracked the Iranian commander whose shadow loomed ever larger and closer.
articles.content:
General Suleimanis net around Israel spread from the Hezbollah strongholds in Lebanon to the Palestinian coastal territory of Gaza, where he provided support to Hamas and was the main patron of Islamic Jihad.
Hamas, the larger Islamic militant group that con… [+1175 chars]

articles.author: Karen Zraick
articles.title: The Death of Iranian General Suleimani: What to Know
articles.description: The killing of the powerful general in Baghdad could have drastic consequences around the world.
articles.content:
The American drone attack near the Baghdad airport early Friday that killed Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani, the powerful Iranian commander, dramatically ratcheted up tensions between Washington and Tehran, threatening to tip hostilities into war. 
Heres what to … [+638 chars]
